sentences.en: A stereoscopic camera is used for stereo - photography.
sentences.cn: 立体相机是用来 立体 摄影的.

sentences.en: And indeed they have large stereoscopic eyes, excellent for night vision.
sentences.cn: 而实际上,它们的确具有大范围的立体视野, 夜间视力也非常好.

sentences.en: Establishing a system of controlling agricultural stereoscopic pollution on the ecological Chongming Island by integrated innovation.
sentences.cn: 实施集成创新战略建立崇明生态岛农业立体污染防控体系.

sentences.en: Following metal prop bamboo pole this sign stereoscopic effect obviously.
sentences.cn: 下面的金属支柱竿显的这牌更立体感.

sentences.en: For a digital stereo mapping system, there are several different Methods: To obtain stereoscopic vision.
sentences.cn: 摘要使用桌上型个人计算机为主机之数位立体制图仪, 有数种形成立体视觉之方法.

sentences.en: Main Outcome Measures LogMAR visual acuity, BCVA, contrast sensitivity and stereoscopic vision.
sentences.cn: 主要指标LogMAR视力 、 最佳矫正视力 、 对比敏感度、立体视锐度.

sentences.en: Stereoscopic vision is the direct perception of distances of objects, using both eyes.
sentences.cn: 立体视觉是两眼对物体距离的直观感觉.

sentences.en: The actuality and development of electronic transformer are introduced , from four types: stereoscopic, plane, chip, film.
sentences.cn: 从立体 、 平面 、 片式 、 薄膜四种类型电子变压器,再次讨论电子变压器的现状和发展问题.

sentences.en: The parallax barrier is the main technology to realize auto stereoscopic display.
sentences.cn: 视差栅栏方式的立体显示技术是现在主要的自动立体显示技术.

sentences.en: This paper introduced the application of S 7 - 200 PLC in automated stereoscopic warehouse.
sentences.cn: 介绍了西门子S7 -200 可编程控制器在自动化立体仓库模型中的应用.

sentences.en: This paper introduces a single - projection - lens LCD stereoscopic video projector with optimized luminous efficiency.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍一种单投影透镜LCD立体电视投影机,它具有最佳的发光效率.

sentences.en: This stereoscopic film is thought of as interesting.
sentences.cn: 这个立体电影被认为是有趣的.

sentences.en: Timothy Spahr, 26, peered through a stereoscopic microscope, shook his head and looked again.
sentences.cn: 26岁的 史巴尔 向立体影像显微镜里瞄了一眼, 摇摇头,再重看一次.

sentences.en: To fully comprehend space we need stereoscopic touch, hearing and vision.
sentences.cn: 我们通过触觉 、 听觉和视觉来完全理解空间.

sentences.en: What's more, it was a stereoscopic defence against outside enemy.
sentences.cn: 这样一座城寨, 是当年辉发的立国之基,也是抵御外敌的坚实防线和最后一道立体防线.

trans.tran_en: a stereoscopic picture, photograph etc appears solid when you look at it through a special machine

trans.tran_cn: 刺， 戳； 黏贴， 黏住； 卡住， 陷住
